homepage.welcome_title: Welcome to the Indonesian Society for Evolutionary Studies (ISES)
homepage.welcome_description: We provide a forum for researchers and students interested in advancing our understanding of the origin, evolution, and maintenance of biodiversity in Indonesia. Our society is dedicated to supporting collaborative research and promote dialogue across evolutionary-related disciplines and enhance public understanding of our field.
homepage.join_community_title: Join Our Community of Evolutionary Researchers
homepage.join_community_description: Be part of Indonesia's premier evolutionary biology network. Connect with researchers, access exclusive resources, and contribute to groundbreaking discoveries.

meta.site_description: The Indonesian Society for Evolutionary Studies (ISES)
